definition: player whose turn comes next (in a game)/next one/my humble home
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Three people notice after Zhou Jiwei home, go to the living area.
sentences.chinese: 三人通知下家後，一起到周計偉所住小區。

sentences.english: That degree of ownership will have passed to investors who buy the next shares.
sentences.chinese: 如果發生交易，這種程度的所有權將同樣傳遞給下家。

sentences.english: One of your referrals canceled account after signing up.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個下家在註冊之後關閉了帳戶口。

definition: to renew or extend a contract
to get a better job somewhere else (idiom)/to seek alternative employment
to terminate an agreement/to cancel a contract
to transfer to another club (professional sports)
to poach (talent, personnel from competitors)/to raid (a competitor for its talent)/Taiwan pr. [wa1 jiao3]
